object

Class MapObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • object.MapObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IMapObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Explosion, MovableEntity, PowerUp, Tile

    public abstract class MapObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMapObject, java.lang.Cloneable
    Author:
    Loris
    Abstract class that implements IMapObject, it provides basic implementations of IMapObject.kill(), IMapObject.hasToDie(), IMapObject.draw(Graphics2D, Point).
    It also adds support for images.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapObject

        public MapObject(int lifes,
                 java.lang.String pathImage,
                 java.awt.Point origin,
                 java.awt.Dimension spriteSize)
        creates a MapObject with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        lifes - number of times this MapObject can be damaged by something
        pathImage - path to the image this MapObject will use
        origin - Point from where the sprite this MapObject will use will be taken
        spriteSize - the size of the sprite to use
        (the sprite is the part of the image this MapObject will use.)
